items.sentence: We stayed at Tom's place in Boston for three days.
An electric current can generate a magnetic field.
Some people believe in God and other people don't.
I'll ask Tom whether he knows how to ride a horse.
I'd hoped Tom would find someone else to help him.
I think I'll ride back with you if you don't mind.
The stew we ate last week tasted better than this.
The problem is that solar energy is too expensive.
The teacher warned us that the test would be hard.
Could you send someone up to pick up some laundry?
